attributes.action: Prevent the BBC and BBC Trust from closing 6 Music Asian Network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is investigating whether to close the above 2 stations, however this is in direct breach of 4 of the Trusts area of accountable committment. Serving all audiences - There are many listeners who do not wish to hear Radio 1 or 2 "pop" music
Content - 6 Music is a leader in its field for new and archive based rarely heard music
Supporting public services broadcasting - there are many of the public who should be supported with the type of music and lineup 6 Music provides
Independence - You dont get much more independent that 6Music. No Simon Cowell factor, promotion of indie labels and new bands. I have personally "bought in to" many new up and coming bands that have yet to see the light of day on many other stations.

I request that the Government intervene and inform the BBC Trust that they are in breach of their own standards and committments

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
